00040 /**
00041  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00042  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00043  * @return SelfDoc
00044  */
00045 SelfDoc CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::explainSelf()
00046     {
00047     CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves obj;
00048     SelfDoc doc;
00049     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00050     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00051     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00052     return doc;
00053     }

00055 /**
00056  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00057  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00058  */
00059 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::getDefaultDocOptions()
00060     {
00061     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00062 
00063     // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00064 
00065     SelfDoc::Opt dTrim = {"trim", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "2.0", "2.0", "NA", "NA", "Log2Ratio Trim value."};
00066     opts.push_back(dTrim);
00067 
00068     SelfDoc::Opt dPercentile = {"percentile", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.75", "0.75", "NA", "NA", "High Percentile value."};
00069     opts.push_back(dPercentile);
00070 
00071     SelfDoc::Opt iWaveCount = {"additional-wave-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1", "1", "0", "NA", "Number of waves to add to the reference."};
00072     opts.push_back(iWaveCount);
00073 
00074     SelfDoc::Opt bDemean = {"demean", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA", "Demean the input to the SVD."};
00075     opts.push_back(bDemean);
00076 
00077     SelfDoc::Opt dCNQCCutoff = {"cn-qc-cutoff", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.27", "0.27", "NA", "NA", "If the CN QC values if over this cutoff then the sample fails QC."};
00078     opts.push_back(dCNQCCutoff);
00079 
00080     SelfDoc::Opt dSNPQCCutoff = {"snp-qc-cutoff", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "1.1", "1.1", "NA", "NA", "If the SNP QC values if below this cutoff then the sample fails QC."};
00081     opts.push_back(dSNPQCCutoff);
00082 
00083     SelfDoc::Opt iWaveSegCountCutoff = {"waviness-seg-count-cutoff", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "100", "100", "0", "NA", "The waviness seg count cutoff."};
00084     opts.push_back(iWaveSegCountCutoff);
00085 
00086     SelfDoc::Opt bUseHighWavinessSegCounts = {"use-high-waviness-seg-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA", "Use only those cychp files that have a waviness-seg-count > the cutoff if true, else use only those cychp files <= the cutoff."};
00087     opts.push_back(bUseHighWavinessSegCounts);
00088 
00089     SelfDoc::Opt bForce = {"force", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA", "Force the job to run even if there is a mismatch between the cychp files and the input CN reference."};
00090     opts.push_back(bForce);
00091 
00092     SelfDoc::Opt bKeepTempData = {"keep-temp-data", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA", "If true, then do not delete the temporary data files used by the module."};
00093     opts.push_back(bKeepTempData);
00094 
00095     SelfDoc::Opt selectedQC = {"selected-qc", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "snp-qc", "snp-qc", "", "", "Choose the QC option to use.  Available values: snp-qc, contrast-qc, and contrast-qc-nsp"};
00096     opts.push_back(selectedQC);
00097 
00098 //    SelfDoc::Opt dCutoff = {"wave-cutoff", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.000001", "0.000001", "0", "NA", "The cutoff for wave calculation."};
00099 //    opts.push_back(dCutoff);
00100 
00101     return opts;
00102     }

00105 /**
00106  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00107  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00108  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00109  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00110  *
00111  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00112  *
00113  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00114  */
00115 SelfCreate * CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::newObject(
00116     std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00117     {
00118     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00119     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00120     CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves* pMethod = new CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves();
00121     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00122 
00123     pMethod->m_dTrim = setupDoubleParameter("trim", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00124     pMethod->m_dPercentile = setupDoubleParameter("percentile", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00125     pMethod->m_iWaveCount = setupIntParameter("additional-wave-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00126     pMethod->m_bDemean = setupBoolParameter("demean", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00127     pMethod->m_dCNQCCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("cn-qc-cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00128     pMethod->m_dSNPQCCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("snp-qc-cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00129     pMethod->m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff = setupIntParameter("waviness-seg-count-cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00130     pMethod->m_bUseHighWavinessSegCount = setupBoolParameter("use-high-waviness-seg-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00131     pMethod->m_bForce = setupBoolParameter("force", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00132     pMethod->m_bKeepTempData = setupBoolParameter("keep-temp-data", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00133     pMethod->m_strSelectedQC = setupStringParameter("selected-qc", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00134 //    pMethod->m_dWaveCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("wave-cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00135 
00136     if ((pMethod->m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff == 0) && (pMethod->m_bUseHighWavinessSegCount == false))
00137     {
00138         Err::errAbort("Cannot specify waviness-seg-count-cutoff=0 and use-high-waviness-seg-count=false for the same run.");
00139     }
00140 
00141     return pMethod;
00142     }
